visualizations module¶

visualizations.plot_distribution_of_doc_word_counts(documents: List[List[str]])[source]¶

Plot a histogram of the number of words in the documents.

Parameters:documents – : List[List[str]]
visualizations.plot_word_clouds_of_topic(topic: topics_and_summary.models.topics.Topic, all_horizontal=True, save=False, dir_save_path=None, dpi=350, show_plot=True)[source]¶

Plots the specified topic and it’s keywords as a word-cloud.

Parameters:
  • topic – Topic obtained with the get_topic() method of the TopicsModel class.
  • all_horizontal – If True, all the keywords are plotted in horizontal.
  • save – If true, the plots are saved to disk.
  • dir_save_path – If save is True, this is the path of the directory where the plots will be saved.
  • dpi – Dots per inches for the images.
  • show_plot – If true, shows the plot while executing.
visualizations.plot_word_clouds_of_topics(topics: List[topics_and_summary.models.topics.Topic], single_plot_per_topic=False, all_horizontal=True, save=False, dir_save_path=None, dpi=350, show_plot=True)[source]¶

Plots the specified topics and it’s keywords as word-clouds.

Parameters:
  • topics – Topics obtained with the get_topics() method of the TopicsModel class.
  • single_plot_per_topic – If True, each topic is plotted in a separated plot. If False, each plot contains 4 topics.
  • all_horizontal – If True, all the keywords are plotted in horizontal.
  • save – If true, the plots are saved to disk.
  • dir_save_path – If save is True, this is the path of the directory where the plots will be saved.
  • dpi – Dots per inches for the images.
  • show_plot – If true, shows the plot while executing.
visualizations.tsne_clustering_chart(model: topics_and_summary.models.topics.TopicsModel, angle=0.99, doc_threshold=0, plot_keywords=True, num_keywords=5, keywords_color_is_black=True, save_path='/Users/carlos/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/topics_and_summary/saved-elements/topics/tsne', plot_name=None, show_plot=True)[source]¶

Use t-SNE technique for dimensionality reduction.

Parameters:
  • model – Topics Model.
  • angle – Number between 0 and 1. Angle less than 0.2 has quickly increasing computation time and angle greater 0.8 has quickly increasing error.
  • doc_threshold – Threshold that each document has to pass to be added to the plot.
  • plot_keywords – If True, the keywords of each topic are plotted near a document of the topic.
  • num_keywords – Number of keyword to show if plot_keywords is True.
  • keywords_color_is_black – If true, the keywords color is black. If not, is the same color as the topic.
  • save_path – Path where the html file with the interactive plot will be saved.
  • plot_name – Name of the plot to be saved.
  • show_plot – If true, opens a browser and shows the html with the plot.
